publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1736 Robert Brown: Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel—That the Parliament notes the problems faced by health visitors and community nurses when using their cars on NHS business and believes that there should be national arrangements on this matter and that there should be provision of free car parking badges to such key workers together with an urgent review of their car leasing and mileage arrangements.

S1M-1736 Robert Brown: Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel—That the Parliament notes the problems faced by health visitors and community nurses when using their cars on NHS business and believes that there should be national arrangements on this matter and that there should be provision of free car parking badges to such key workers together with an urgent review of their car leasing and mileage arrangements.
S1M-1736 Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel (lodged on 8 March 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-1736 Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel (lodged on 8 March 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-1736# Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel (lodged on 8 March 2001) Brian Adam*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1736# Robert Brown: Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel—That the Parliament notes the problems faced by health visitors and community nurses when using their cars on NHS business and believes that there should be national arrangements on this matter and that there should be provision of free car parking badges to such key workers together with an urgent review of their car leasing and mileage arrangements Supported by: Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-1736# Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel (lodged on 8 March 2001) Michael Russell*, Donald Gorrie*, Andrew Wilson*

S1M-1736# Robert Brown: Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel—That the Parliament notes the problems faced by health visitors and community nurses when using their cars on NHS business and believes that there should be national arrangements on this matter and that there should be provision of free car parking badges to such key workers together with an urgent review of their car leasing and mileage arrangements Supported by: Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Russell, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-1736# Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel (lodged on 8 March 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-1736# Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel (lodged on 8 March 2001) Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-1736# Robert Brown: Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel—That the Parliament notes the problems faced by health visitors and community nurses when using their cars on NHS business and believes that there should be national arrangements on this matter and that there should be provision of free car parking badges to such key workers together with an urgent review of their car leasing and mileage arrangements Supported by: Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Russell, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Cathy Peattie, Mr Keith Raffan, Maureen Macmillan

S1M-1736# Robert Brown: Health Visitor and Community Nurse Car Travel—That the Parliament notes the problems faced by health visitors and community nurses when using their cars on NHS business and believes that there should be national arrangements on this matter and that there should be provision of free car parking badges to such key workers together with an urgent review of their car leasing and mileage arrangements Supported by: Shona Robison, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Russell, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Cathy Peattie, Mr Keith Raffan, Maureen Macmillan
